capability_gate_water.text: You may need to check simple water controls, valves, and indicator panels. You will not be asked to disconnect hoses, remove panels, or use tools. Are you comfortable proceeding?

safety_check_active_water_hazard.text: If you see active leaking, spraying water, or water near electrical components, stop immediately to prevent damage. Turn off the city spigot or turn the pump OFF only if it can be done safely. Tap Continue only after the hazard is controlled, or if no hazard is present.

clarify_water_source.text:
Right now, are you using city water (hose connected to campground spigot) or your fresh tank and pump?

Quick fact (optional): City water is pressurized by the campground; the RV pump is usually OFF on city water. The fresh tank pump pressurizes your system only when you are not on city water.

not_sure_prompt.text: Is a water hose connected to your RV and the campground spigot right now?

city_source_check.text: At the campground spigot, is the water turned ON and does it appear to have pressure?

city_spigot_test_prompt.text: If you have a small faucet at the spigot, can you confirm water comes out there?

city_hose_kink_check.text: Is your city water hose free of kinks and fully connected at both ends?

city_inlet_check.text: At your RV city water inlet, do you see any obvious leak or spraying water when the spigot is on?

city_symptom_scope.text: On city water, is it no water everywhere, or low water and weak flow?

city_valve_mode_check.text: Do you have a docking station or utility panel with a water mode setting (city, tank fill, normal, winterize)?

city_mode_position_check.text: Is the water mode set to NORMAL or CITY, not TANK FILL and not WINTERIZE?

city_filter_regulator_check.text: Do you have a pressure regulator at the spigot, or an inline water filter on the hose?

pump_switch_check_city.text: While on city water, is your RV water pump switch OFF?

tank_level_check.text: Does your fresh tank level show water present?

tank_air_spit_check.text: When you open a faucet, do you get air spitting or any water at all?

pump_switch_check_tank.text: Is your water pump switch ON? Some RVs have more than one pump switch.

pump_sound_check.text: When you open a faucet, do you hear the water pump running?

pump_behavior_check.text: When the faucet is closed, does the pump stop within about 10 seconds?

pump_fuse_check.text: Can you locate the water pump fuse or breaker on your 12V fuse panel?

pump_fuse_observed.text: Do you see a blown pump fuse or a tripped pump breaker?

artifact.stop_reason: User not comfortable proceeding
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Avoid further operation until evaluated by a technician.
recommendations: Pause diagnosis, minimize water usage, and schedule a technician.
If you suspect a leak, turn the pump OFF and shut off the city spigot only if it can be done safely.

terminal_city_spigot_off_or_no_pressure.result: City water source not providing pressure

artifact.stop_reason: No pressure at campground spigot
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Turn off the spigot, relieve hose pressure, and avoid leaving the hose pressurized unattended.
recommendations: Schedule a technician and share this artifact so they can triage the issue quickly.

terminal_city_spigot_uncertain.result: City water source pressure not confirmed

artifact.stop_reason: User unable to confirm spigot pressure safely
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Avoid leaving the hose pressurized unattended.
Use fresh tank and pump if available.
recommendations: Schedule a technician and share this artifact so they can triage the issue quickly.

terminal_city_hose_issue_observed.result: City water hose or connection issue observed

artifact.stop_reason: Hose kinked or loose connection
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Turn off the spigot before adjusting anything.
Keep electrical cords away from water.
recommendations: Schedule a technician and share this artifact so they can triage the issue quickly.

terminal_city_inlet_leak_observed.result: Leak observed at city water inlet

artifact.stop_reason: Water spraying or leaking at inlet
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Turn off the spigot immediately to prevent flooding.
Use fresh tank and pump if available.
recommendations: Schedule a technician and share this artifact so they can triage the issue quickly.

terminal_water_mode_not_normal.result: Water mode setting not in normal position

artifact.stop_reason: Docking station or valve mode not set to normal or city
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Do not force valves.
If unsure, stop and capture photos for a technician.
recommendations: Schedule a technician and share this artifact so they can triage the issue quickly.

terminal_city_low_flow_with_regulator_or.result: Low flow likely due to regulator, filter, or campground pressure

artifact.stop_reason: Low flow everywhere on city water
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: If flow is usable, conserve water and avoid running multiple fixtures at once.
recommendations: Schedule a technician and share this artifact so they can triage the issue quickly.

terminal_city_low_flow_no_regulator_filt.result: Low flow likely due to campground pressure or inlet restriction

artifact.stop_reason: Low flow everywhere on city water
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: If flow is usable, conserve water and avoid running multiple fixtures at once.
recommendations: Schedule a technician and share this artifact so they can triage the issue quickly.

terminal_city_low_flow_unknown_regulator.result: Low flow on city water, regulator/filter presence unknown

artifact.stop_reason: Low flow everywhere on city water
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: If flow is usable, conserve water and avoid running multiple fixtures at once.
recommendations: Schedule a technician and share this artifact so they can triage the issue quickly.

terminal_city_partial_fixture_issue.result: City water affects only some fixtures

artifact.stop_reason: Partial fixture impact
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Avoid forcing valves.
Document which fixtures fail and which work.
recommendations: Schedule a technician and share this artifact so they can triage the issue quickly.

terminal_city_pump_on_note.result: Pump switch on while on city water

artifact.stop_reason: Pump switch not off during city water use
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Turn pump OFF if comfortable.
If you are not sure, stop and capture the current state for a technician.
recommendations: Schedule a technician and share this artifact so they can triage the issue quickly.

terminal_city_no_water_system_level.result: City water path likely has a blockage or check valve issue

artifact.stop_reason: City pressure present, no water at fixtures
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Turn off the spigot when away.
Use fresh tank and pump if available.
recommendations: Schedule a technician and share this artifact so they can triage the issue quickly.

artifact.stop_reason: Fresh tank shows empty
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Turn pump OFF to avoid running it dry.
recommendations: Schedule a technician and share this artifact so they can triage the issue quickly.

terminal_tank_low_or_air_in_lines.result: Fresh tank low or air entering the pump

artifact.stop_reason: Air spitting observed
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Turn pump OFF if it is rapidly cycling, and conserve remaining water.
recommendations: Schedule a technician and share this artifact so they can triage the issue quickly.

artifact.stop_reason: Pump switch not on
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Avoid further operation until evaluated by a technician.
recommendations: Schedule a technician and share this artifact so they can triage the issue quickly.

artifact.stop_reason: User unsure of pump switch location
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Avoid further operation until evaluated by a technician.
recommendations: Schedule a technician and share this artifact so they can triage the issue quickly.

terminal_pump_fuse_not_found.result: Pump not running, fuse panel not located

artifact.stop_reason: Cannot locate 12V fuse panel
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Avoid further operation until evaluated by a technician.
recommendations: Schedule a technician and share this artifact so they can triage the issue quickly.

terminal_pump_fuse_or_breaker_issue.result: Pump fuse blown or breaker tripped

artifact.stop_reason: Protection device indicates fault
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Avoid further operation until evaluated by a technician.
recommendations: Schedule a technician and share this artifact so they can triage the issue quickly.

artifact.stop_reason: Pump silent with switch on
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Avoid further operation until evaluated by a technician.
recommendations: Schedule a technician and share this artifact so they can triage the issue quickly.

terminal_pump_runs_but_no_flow.result: Pump runs but water flow not restored

artifact.stop_reason: Pump runs, stops normally, but water still not flowing
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Turn pump OFF when not actively testing to avoid damage or leaks.
recommendations: Schedule a technician and share this artifact so they can triage the issue quickly.

terminal_pump_runs_continuously_or_cycle.result: Pump behavior suggests leak, restriction, or pressure issue

artifact.stop_reason: Pump does not stop or cycles unexpectedly
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Turn pump OFF when not in use.
Check for visible leaks under the RV.
recommendations: Schedule a technician and share this artifact so they can triage the issue quickly.
